kk i think i have it :

            if (c.actionTimer == 0) {
			int mining = misc.random(25);
			if (mining > 0) {
		if (mining >= 13 && mining <= 20) {
		c.addItem(405,1);
		c.sendMessage("@sha@@yel@You Hit The Rock Super Hard, And A Casket Appeared");
		} else if (mining >= 21) {
		c.addItem(2528, 1);
		c.sendMessage("@sha@@yel@You Hit The Rock Super Hard, And A Lamp Appeared");
		}
			int reward = misc.random(2000000);
                c.addSkillXP((150 * c.playerLevel[14]), 14);
                c.addItem(995, reward);
                c.sendMessage("@bla@YOU GET SOME MINING XP! AND CASH!");	
                c.setAnimation(624);
                c.actionTimer = 15;
                c.updateRequired = true; 
                c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} 
	}

item.title: [allstar] random problem
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

hey, i am making some things for the mining on my allstar, and i have this :

            if (c.actionTimer == 0) {
			int mining = misc.random(25);
			if (mining >= 0) {
			int reward = misc.random(2000000);
                c.addSkillXP((150 * c.playerLevel[14]), 14);
                c.addItem(995, reward);
                c.sendMessage("@bla@YOU GET SOME MINING XP! AND CASH!");	
                c.setAnimation(624);
                c.actionTimer = 15;
                c.updateRequired = true; 
                c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else if (mining >= 13 && mining <= 20) {
		c.addItem(405,1);
		c.sendMessage("@sha@@yel@You Hit The Rock Super Hard, And A Casket Appeared");
		} else if (mining >= 21) {
		c.addItem(2528, 1);
		c.sendMessage("@sha@@yel@You Hit The Rock Super Hard, And A Lamp Appeared");
		}
	}

i get no errors in compiler, but the problem is is that these codes :

		} else if (mining >= 13 && mining <= 20) {
		c.addItem(405,1);
		c.sendMessage("@sha@@yel@You Hit The Rock Super Hard, And A Casket Appeared");
		} else if (mining >= 21) {
		c.addItem(2528, 1);
		c.sendMessage("@sha@@yel@You Hit The Rock Super Hard, And A Lamp Appeared");
		}

they are never usedâ€¦ so i need to know whyâ€¦
